snippet.title: The Colony 2044 - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Releasing as EARLY ACCESS on Steam (WISHLIST NOW) March 10th! 
--
Balance survival with strategic combat in this unique simulation. Lead a bunny colony through a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombie bunnies. Manage resources, construct a thriving settlement, and navigate intricate social dynamics to uncover the cure held by one of your survivors. 
--
Follow us on social so you never miss a thing!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nexragestudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@nexragestudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nexragestudios
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/nexragestudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/nexrage-studios-llc
